
                            
                            <p>后台app联网刷新也开启的，每天都错过消息，需要看消息和文字消息都没通知，后台运行后再点开VX就转<a href="https://peppermall.meituan.com/mp/qr/talentRegister/?cid=59&amp;rid=1967853036&amp;hashCode=bb56b28b4adabda5c621c9317a19dbac&amp;lch=mhqKFH3wpuVorKX" target="_blank" class="infotextkey">圈圈</a>，想看VX消息还不能后台运行，怎么办啊？ <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/29/070305fdizlaf3adwf75rl.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/29/070305fdizlaf3adwf75rl.jpg"> <br>  </p>
